item.title: Where Is Hugo
item.description: Why a TXT DNS Record is both necessary, and fun when it comes to using a custom domain name for this blog

item.title: It Starts Here
item.description: This site exists mostly for me collect things as they fly by. I'm not particularly expert at anything, but I've come to truly enjoy a wide array of "huh; what abouts..." where I take the things I've seen before, hone them, and fit them into the future
